course_description: This course provides an overview of mental health services and policy by exploring the complex and dynamic relationship between general health, mental health, and public health in the United States. Why, given the frequent concurrence of these types of conditions, are the systems that treat them so far apart? What are the implications of this gap for improving outcomes for people with mental health conditions?
